Library

Here I've collected various books, comics, games, and other bits of media that are important to me. This page is meant for adults only, and some of the works referenced here will contain adult themes - you've been warned!

p.s. mouse-over links to see thumbnails

p.p.s. this is a work in progress - expect to see more here soon

comics and zines

  • The Pervert by Remy Boydell and Michelle Perez
    • The memoir of a trans woman illustrated with funny animals. Charlie Brown is there. Surreal, one-of-a-kind comic. You'll laugh, you'll cry - you'll mostly cry. A lot. At least, I did.
    • "Discussing the Pervert feat. Michelle Perez" - March 3, 2024
  • Chaser by Yaster Goodman
    • Zine about why you feel weird about being attracted to girls and looking like a man and having body hair and having a man's voice and having short hair and - huh? I think I was saying something relevant there. Send this to every man in your phone.
    • Check out her other work here:
      • Yaster Goodman on itch.io
      • @gaydottiff on Twitter
  • Dykes to Watch Out For by Allison Bechdel
    • You know that joke about the Bechdel test? As it turns out, the comic it came from, "Dykes to Watch Out For", actually features a whole lot more than just a joke that people take too seriously sometimes. Quoting from Bechdel's site here, "Alison Bechdelâ€™s comic strip Dykes To Watch Out For became a countercultural institution among lesbians and discerning non-lesbians all over the planet. And her more recent, darkly humorous graphic memoirs about her family have forged an unlikely intimacy with an even wider range of readers." It's a comic that's well worth your time.
    • Allison Bechdels Website
